conclusion: Understanding gravitational force and its effect on objects in motion is necessary to solve the problem.
Objects A and B will experience the force of gravity when they fall.
Gravity pulls objects towards the ground, so A and B will move towards the surface.
Objects A and B will land on the surface at the location of objects C, D, E, F.
Final answer: Objects A and B will land on the surface at the location of objects C, D, E, F due to gravity.
